subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
lead_paragraph: Herman Edwards leaves with a three-year regular-season record of 15-33, including 6-26 the last two years, and with one year remaining on a four-year, $12 million contract.
snippet: Herman Edwards leaves with a three-year regular-season record of 15-33, including 6-26 the last two years, and with one year remaining on a four-year, $12 million contract.
